pageContent: Oncosexuality has recently become a new supportive care mission. Sexual morbidity is, routinely, underestimated and must be questioned. We report here the most frequent disorders for men and for women, how to prevent them and how to treat them.

metaData.source:
Impact of Focal Versus Whole Gland Ablation for Prostate Cancer on Sexual Function and Urinary Continence
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33119421/
